alert.note: Alert for Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:09AM CST until January 03 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAFAYETTE...YALOBUSHA...NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN... NORTHEASTERN TALLAHATCHIE AND SOUTHEASTERN PANOLA COUNTIES... At 809 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Scobey, or near Charleston, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Water Valley, Charleston, George Payne State Park, Holly Springs National Forest, Coffeeville, Pope, Enid, Springdale, Burgess, Banner, Velma, Scobey, Paris, Oakland, Courtland, Taylor, Ellard, Gums and Eureka Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
